Translations.Text: geuui junimkkeseo seongseuleoun goljjagiin ‘ttuwa’ eseo geuleul bulleossnola
“geudaeneun palao-egelo gala, sillo geuneun gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseossnola”
“geuligo malhala : ‘geudae(palao)neun kkaekkeushaejigil balaneunga?’ ”
“ ‘naega geudaeleul geudae junim-eulo indohalyeo hani, geuleohge geudaeneun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehage doel geos-ila’ “
geu hu geu(mose)neun geu(palao)ege eomahan jingpyoleul boyeojueoss-euna
geuneun bu-inhago bulboghayeossnola
geu hu geuneun kkongmunileul ppaemyeo (geoyeogham-e) maejinhani
(salamdeul-eul) moa bulleossnola
geu hu geuga malhagil “jim-eun geudaedeul-ui gajang jigohan junim-ila”
geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun naesewa hyeonse-ui jing-gyeloseo geuleul umkyeojab-eusyeossnola
jinsillo igeos-eneun dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyohun-i issnola
changjoga deo eolyeoun geos-eun geudaedeul-inga animyeon haneul-inga? geubunkkeseo geugeos(haneul)eul jieusyeossnola
geubunkkeseoneun geugeos(haneul)ui kkogdaegileul ollisyeossgo geu hu geugeos-eul gyundeunghage dusyeoss-eumyeo
geugeos-ui bam-eul eodubge hasyeossgo geugeos-ui achimbich-eul naesyeossnola
ttang-eun geu hue pyeolchisyeossgo
geugeos(ttang)eulobuteo geugeos-ui mulgwa mogcho(mogcho)leul naesyeoss-eumyeo
san-eun dandanhi gojeongsikisyeoss-euni
geudaedeulgwa geudaedeul gachug-eul wihan pyeon-uila
geulihayeo eomcheongnan daejaeang-i dolaehayeoss-eul ttae
geunal ingan-eun jasin-ui nolyeog-eul tteoollil geos-ila
boneun ja-ege jiog-ui moseub-i deuleonal ttae
gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseomyeonseo
hyeonse-ui salm-eul seonhohadeon janeun
sillo taoleuneun buljiog, geugos-i geojujiga doel geos-ila
geuleona jasin-ui junim ap-e seoneun il-eul dulyeowohamyeo jasin-ui yogguleul jeoljehadeon janeun
sillo cheongug, geugos-i geojujiga doel geos-ila
geudeul-i geudae(muhammadeu)ege jongmal-ui sigan-e gwanhae mul-euni “geugeos-eun eonje gaesidoendan mal-inga?”
geugeos(gaesi sigan)ui eongeub-e gwanhayeo geudaega eotteon gwanlyeon-i issdan mal-inga
geugeos-ui jisig-eun geudae junimkkeman issneun geos-ila
geudaeneun ojig geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyeong-gojail ppun-ila
geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul boneun nal geudeul-eun machi (hyeonseeseo) ohuna achimnajeolman-eul meomulleossda saeng-gaghal geos-ila
